Class BlockUtil

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.util.BlockUtil
public final class BlockUtil extends Object
Various utilities for manipulating and getting block related data.
Since:
0.4.6

  • Method Details

    • getDoubleChest

      @Nullable public static @Nullable org.bukkit.block.BlockState getDoubleChest(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Get the BlockState of the double chest of given block.
      Parameters:
      block - The other half of the chest. Can be any block, this will check for it.
      Returns:
      The BlockState of the double chest, null if given block was not a chest.
      Since:
      0.4.6

    • getOtherDoorHalf

      @Nullable public static @Nullable org.bukkit.block.Block getOtherDoorHalf(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.BlockState state)
      Gets the other half of the door, as per the block given.
      Parameters:
      state - The BlockState of the door half.
      Returns:
      Returns the other half of the door, or null if the given state is not a door.
      Since:
      0.4.6

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String capitalizeFirstLetters(@NotNull @NotNull String str)

    • getHumanReadableBlockName

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String getHumanReadableBlockName(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.Material material)
      Gets the human-readable name of the given material. Note that this is not translated and is merely based of the material enum name.
      Returns:
      A human-readable name.
      Since:
      1.1.0
